info.title: Setu BBPS BillPay
info.description: Enable easy BBPS bill payments in your App

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Billers are sorted via the Biller ID. Providing a biller Id fetches billers right after this biller in a paginated way.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Searches the provided text over Biller name and Biller Alias

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: full-date notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: full-date notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21

app.description: Mandatory if channel is `MOB`, `MOBB`. Not required for others.

channel.description:
This is the initiating channel.
1. `AGT`: Offline agent.
2. `BNKBRNCH`: Bank branch.
3. `BSC`: Business correspondent
4. `MOB`: Mobile application
5. `INT`: Internet portal
6. `INTB`: Internet banking
7. `MOBB`: Mobile banking
8. `ATM`: ATM
9. `KIOSK`: KIOSK

geocode.description: Mandatory if channel is `AGT`, `BSC` and `BNKBRNCH`. Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

id.description: The ID of the agent initiating the BBPS transaction.

ifsc.description: Mandatory if channel is `BNKBRNCH`. Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

imei.description: Mandatory if channel is `MOB`, `MOBB`. Not required for others.

ip.description: Mandatory if channel is `INT`, `INTB`. Not required for others.

mac.description: Mandatory if channel is `INT`, `INTB`. Not required for others.

mobile.description: Mandatory if channel is `AGT`, `BSC` and `BNKBRNCH`. Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

os.description: Mandatory if channel is `MOB`, `MOBB`. Not required for others.

postalCode.description: Mandatory if channel is  `AGT`, `BSC` and `BNKBRNCH`. Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

terminalId.description: Mandatory if channel is `ATM`, `AGT`, `KIOSK` and `BSC` . Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

name.description: The display name of the parameter. This has to match what is sent in fields.

value.description: The value of the customer parameter

billParameters.description: The bill params for fetching the bill

fetchApiType.description: Denotes whether the biller accepts Fetch, Validate or Direct payment.

autoFetch.description: When `true`, enables autofetch on successful bill.

mobile.description: Mobile number with 6, 10 and 20 digits are valid.

assigned.description: BBPOU to which the complaint is assigned

responseCode.description: Carries the response code indicating success or failure of the transaction

additionalInfo.description: Plan Additional information details provided by the Biller.

categorySubType.description: Plan sub category as defined by the Biller.

categoryType.description: Plan category as defined by the Biller.

description.description: Plan description as defined by the Biller.

effectiveFrom.description: Effective from date of corresponding Plan.

effectiveTo.description: Effective to date of corresponding Plan.

status.description: Effective to date of corresponding Plan.
